extension.name: mod_joomgallery_slider
extension.author: Daniel H Pavey
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later; see LICENSE.txt
extension.description: Custom Joomgallery Slideshow Module. Defers loading of images with Javascript

field.name: joomgallery-category
field.label: Joomgallery Category ID
field.description: The Category ID of the gallery you wish to display

field.name: include-css
field.label: Include CSS?
field.description: Do you want to load module CSS File. If you do not you will need to style slider in your own css file

field.name: include-jquery
field.label: Include jQuery?
field.description: Do you need the module to load jQuery for you?

field.name: width
field.label: Slider Width
field.description: Set a width for the slider

field.name: height
field.label: Slider Height
field.description: Set a height for the slider

field.name: slideshowinterval
field.label: Slideshow Interval (ms)
field.description: Set the slideshow interval in milliseconds
